name: Far Cry 5: The Father Edition
summary:
Far Cry 5: The Father Edition includes: 
 
Far Cry 5: Deluxe Edition. 
A Premium Collector’s Box with exclusive arts of the Seed Family. 
The exclusive Joseph Seed Figurine, also called “The Father”, and its colorised stained glass (Total height : 31.3 cm). 
An exclusive Steelbook. 
A double-sided tourist map of Hope County featuring point of interest and key locations. 
The Original Soundtrack of the Game.
